. Many people coming from the south choose to take the car with them on the train from

value:
content=Lapin Luontoelämys (Finnish for Lapland’s Nature Experience) offers unique winter and summer activities at Levi and in the whole of Lapland.

In wintertime, the means of transportation are snowshoes, kicksleds and skis. In the summer, we paddle and ride mountain bikes in addition to hiking. All this takes place in the region of Lapland: on its rivers, lakes, and fells.
content=Siberian Huskies, Movie Wolves, Reindeer, Arctic foxies, Spitsdogs, Husky safaris, Christmas with Huskies, Guidet visit always.
